name: Muzea Insider Consulting Services
overview:
Muzea Insider Consulting Services, LLC has been a premier provider of U.S. legal “insider” trading research to Institutional Investors since 1994. MICS began analyzing legal “insider” activity (director’s dealings) for the European countries in October 2010.

Muzea Insider Consulting Services analyzes insider trading (via Form 4 filings) on a live basis. Through its extensive database, coupled with its propriety ranking system and time established ranking criteria, MICS is able to point out unusual and significant insider activity and communicate that information to its clients in a timely and unbiased manner.
